name: Zamulosh
behaviour: Zamulosh will become [[Invisible]] very often. It is occasionally teleported to the center of the room.
strategy:
Since this boss will be found with multiple clones (5 weak and 1 equally strong), that best way to deal with it is to always attack using area damage (such as [[Avalanche Rune]]s and [[Diamond Arrow]]s) to hit them all. If the false Zamuloshs aren't attacked, the team will be teleported to the center of the room, forcing you to lose turns and reposition, so even if you figure out which one is the real Zamulosh, focusing on it is not recommended. 

It may be difficult to keep up with the real boss' HP during the fight, but if the team is using area attacks the real Zamulosh will eventually die (and the clones also disappear when this happens).
